mapper.select: SELECT * FROM resume r, resume_detail d WHERE r.resume_id=d.resume_id AND r.resume_state = 'Y' ORDER BY r.resume_update LIMIT 9 OFFSET 0

SELECT * FROM users u
,users_detail ud
,user_company_detail ud
where u.id=ud.id and u.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_detail( id, user_phone, user_age, user_gender, user_zip, user_address1, user_address2, user_profile ) VALUES(#{id},#{user_phone},#{user_age},#{user_gender},#{user_zip},#{user_address1},#{user_address2},#{user_profile})

INSERT INTO user_company_detail( id, company_logo, company_intro, company_owner, company_name, company_homepage, company_address1, company_address2, company_zip, company_startDay, company_sales, company_people, company_money ) VALUES( #{id},#{company_logo},#{company_intro},#{company_owner},#{company_name}, #{company_homepage},#{company_address1},#{company_address2},#{company_zip}, #{company_startDay},#{company_sales},#{company_people},#{company_money} )
insert into apply_information ( id, hire_id, resume_id, apply_result, apply_date ) values ( #{id}, #{hire_id}, #{resume_id}, '대기', NOW() )
